images.prompt: A high-detail digital masterpiece depicting a formidable desert banshee queen emerging from a sunken ruin haze, her steampunk armor adorned with intricate bronze filigree and glowing night indigo accents, reflected multiple times through surreal mirror echoes that distort and multiply her ghostly visage, while shimmering water droplets cascade in fluid motion around her, capturing the eerie, otherworldly atmosphere of an ancient, abandoned civilization shrouded in mysterious fog, illuminated by diffuse, dusky light that enhances the haunting, majestic aura of this spectral realm.
